caller_intent: Christina needs a certificate of compliance (specifically the FS1 form) for Eduardo Hernandez's vehicle, which was involved in a traffic stop in May. She requires this document to prove insurance to the DMV.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the need for a certificate of compliance (FS1 form) for a traffic stop incident on May 15.
Agent confirms the vehicle involved is a 2020 Ram and the insurance provider is Progressive.
Agent requests Christina's email address (June.Alex@Ymail.com) to send the form once obtained.
Agent states they will contact Progressive to retrieve the required documentation.
knowledge_required: Understanding state-specific insurance compliance forms (e.g., NC's FS1 form).
Process for obtaining proof of insurance from carriers like Progressive.
Handling DMV-related compliance documentation for traffic violations.
summary: Christina seeks a certificate of compliance (FS1 form) for Eduardo's vehicle after a May traffic stop. The agent will contact Progressive to retrieve the form and send it to Christina's email (June.Alex@Ymail.com). The call remains open pending confirmation from the insurance provider.
